name: Category 1 Cyclone Economic Exposure (US$ x 1000 per sq km)
description: Dataset courtesy of the PREVIEW Global Risk Data Platform. This dataset includes an estimation of the averag annual economical exposition to tropical cyclones of Saffir-Simpson category I over the period 1970 - 2010. It is based on three sources: 1) IBTrACS v03r03 (1969 - 2011, http://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/oa/ibtracs/), year 2011 completed by online data from JMA, JTWC and UNISYS. 2) A GIS modeling based on an initial equation from Greg Holland, which was further modified to take into consideration the movement of the cyclones through time. 3) A Global Domestic Product grid for the year 2010, provided by the World Bank. Unit is expected average annual GDP (2010 as the year of reference) exposed in thousand US $ (year 2000 equivalent) . This product was modeled using global data and aggregated to ~ 5 km resolution to be distributed. Credit: Raw data: IBTrACS,JMA, JTWC, UNISYS and World Bank, compilation and GIS processing UNEP/GRID-Geneva. Metadata
